links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); y=0; x=Pi; m=x; x2=x*x; n=1; nf=1; s=1; while (x!=y, y=x; n++; nf*=n; n++; nf*=n; m*=x2; s=-s; x+=s*m/(n*nf)); x=contfrac(x); for (n=1, 20000, write("b036790.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 01 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
